name: taalradar
description: [Taalradar](http://taalradar.ivdnt.org) is a crowdsourcing application of the [Instituut voor de Nederlandse Taal](https://github.com/INL), enabling speakers of Dutch to contribute to the knowledge about the Dutch language. The application is based on [PyBOSSA](https://github.com/scifabric/pybossa).
